issue.title: refactor(cli/migrate): use `oxc` kit to parse and migrate js/ts files

repository.name: tauri
repository.description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend.

issue.body:
closes #10192

<!--
Before submitting a PR, please read https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/blob/dev/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-guidelines

1. Give the PR a descriptive title.

  Examples of good title:
    - fix(windows): fix race condition in event loop
    - docs: update docstrings
    - feat: add `Window::set_fullscreen`

  Examples of bad title:
    - fix #7123
    - update docs
    - fix bugs

2. If there is a related issue, reference it in the PR text, e.g. closes #123.
3. If this change requires a new version, then add a change file in `.changes` directory with the appropriate bump, see https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/blob/dev/.changes/README.md
4. Ensure that all your commits are signed https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/managing-commit-signature-verification/signing-commits
5. Ensure `cargo test` and `cargo clippy` passes.
6. Propose your changes as a draft PR if your work is still in progress.
-->

body:
I opened a PR for this:
- 1 & 2: fixed
- 3: I added partial migration so `import { appWindow } from '@tauri-apps/api/window'` becomes `import { getCurrent as appWindow } from 'webviewWindow'`, you still gonna need to do manual changes because `appWindow` will be a function and you'll need to add `()` after each call to it.
- 4: I couldn't reproduce but should be fixed as well

in the dialog example you provided, 

```ts
import { dialog } from '@tauri-apps/api';
```
will change to
```ts
import dialog from '@tauri-apps/plugin-dialog';
```

so the rest of the code should work

issue.title: [bug] Migration tool incorrect output for Dialog plugin.

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

repository.name: tauri
repository.description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend.

issue.body:
### Describe the bug

I create issue #10192, I retry migration use rc version.

migration tool convert to dialog plugin:

```tsx
...(snip)
import dialog from "@tauri-apps/plugin-dialog"
...(snip)
    const directory = await dialog.open({
...(snip)
```

It was output as shown in [#10192](https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/issues/10192#issuecomment-2210774737), but I got this error.

```sh
Attempted import error: '@tauri-apps/plugin-dialog' does not contain a default export (imported as 'dialog').
ERROR in ./src/VirtualChannelRegister.tsx 18:28-39
export 'default' (imported as 'dialog') was not found in '@tauri-apps/plugin-dialog' (possible exports: ask, confirm, message, open, save)
```

### Reproduction

git clone http://github.com/mikoto2000/scab-player
cd scab-player
npm i @tauri-apps/cli@next @tauri-apps/api@next
npm run tauri migrate
npm run tauri dev

### Expected behavior

This error should not occur.

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
$ npm run tauri info
npm run tauri info

> scab-player@1.0.0 tauri
> tauri info


[✔] Environment
    - OS: Debian 12.0.0 X64
    ✔ webkit2gtk-4.1: 2.44.2
    ✔ rsvg2: 2.54.7
    ✔ rustc: 1.79.0 (129f3b996 2024-06-10)
    ✔ cargo: 1.79.0 (ffa9cf99a 2024-06-03)
    ✔ rustup: 1.27.1 (54dd3d00f 2024-04-24)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (default)
    - node: 22.2.0
    - yarn: 1.22.19
    - npm: 10.7.0

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-rc.0
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-rc.0
    - wry [RUST]: 0.41.0
    - tao [RUST]: 0.28.1
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 2.0.0-rc.0
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 2.0.0-rc.1

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - frontendDist: ../build
    - devUrl: http://localhost:3000/
    - framework: React
```


### Stack trace

```text
no stack trace.
```


### Additional context

_No response_
